title: shrI ramA ramaNa
sahitya:
shrI ramA ramaNa nArAyaNA nava sArasa daLa nayana jaganmOhanA divya


anupallavi

  cAracOra nipuNa janArdanA dhIra phaNirAja pUjita nAmanA


caraNam    vAraNa tApa vivAraNA manmatha kAraNa kSIrAbdhi kalpa nayanA
bhArati pati priya nAradanuta pArthasArathE tava sharaNam dEhi
